title: Bug 7752: Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails.
OB: When attempting to export multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, an error occurs during the export process.
EB: The export process should successfully create a zip file containing all selected files, even if they share the same name but belong to different directories.
SR:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects.
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (e.g., "foo.txt").
3. From the main menu, select File > Export and choose Zip File as the export option.
4. In the Export dialog window, select both projects, provide a name for the zip file (e.g., "test.zip"), and initiate the export process.
